titleStmt.title: SII 8.30: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 30. (A.R. No. 444 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
pūmaṉṉu patumam pūtta veḻulakun tāmuṉ cey tavattāṟ parutivaḻit toṉṟi neṭumāliva
nena cuṭarmuṭi cūṭi Irunilamakaḷai yurimaiyiṟpuṇarntu tirumakaḷ paṇaimulaic ceñcān taṇintu
paṉaivarai mārva maṇivarai nikarppac cayamakaḷ centaṉac cuvaṭṭāṟ puya mirukayilaip po
ruppeṉṉat toṉṟa nāmakaḷtāṉu meṅkomakaṉ cevvāyp pavaḷac ceyoḷi paṭait
taṉaṉyāṉeṉa tavaḷanaṉniṟan tanittuṭaiyeneṉap pukaḻmakaḷ cintai makiḻ nāḷiṉu morukuṭai
nilavum porupaṭait tikiri veyiluṅ karuṅkaliyiruḷait turappa niṭu pallūḻi yeḻkaṭaṟ puṟatti
ṉuṅ koṭāc centaṉikko liṉitulāva miṉamuñ cilaiyuñ citaintu vāṉuyarp poṉneṭu meru
viṟ puvi vīṟṟiruppa Umpariyāṉai yoreṭṭiṉukkun tampameṉṉat taṉittaṉi ticaitoṟum vi
jaiyastaMbham niṟppa pacippakaiyāṉattu niṅki maṉnuyir taḻaippa maṉuvāṟu peruka mātavar tavamu ma
ṅkaiyar kaṟpu mātiyantaṇa rākutip pukaiyu miteḻu koṇṭal vīcu taṇpuṉalu metiṉi vaḷamuñ cāti
yoḻukkamu niki yaṟamum piṟaḻātu niṟpap pāvum paḻaṉapparappum paṇaikkai māvu mallatu vaṉṟaḷaippaṭutal
kaṉaviluṅ kāṇṭaṟ kariteṉa varunatippuṭaiyiṉum palveṟu puḷḷiṉu mallatu ciṟaipaṭuta liṉṟi niṟai pe
ruñ celvamo ṭavaṉivāḻ pallavar teluṅkar māḷavar kaliṅkar kocalar kaṉnaṭar kaṭārar teṉnar ceralar ciṅkaḷar ko
ṅkaṇar tirikartta raṅka ravantiyar kaikayar jinaka raṟaikaḻal ventaru mallā varaicaru muṟaimaiyil varinta tiṟaikuṇan tiṟaiñ
cavum Ampoṉmaṭakkoṭi cempiyaṉkiḻāṉaṭi Aruḷmukan tiṉituṭaṉiruppa Aruḷpuri cempoṟkoṭ ṭimaiyappāvaiyuñ
civaṉum polac cempoṉvīrasiṁhāsanattup puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirājakesaripaṉmarā
ṉa tiripuvaṉacakravarttikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu nālāvatu jayaṅṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuc cem
pūrkkoṭṭattup poṟaiyūrnāṭṭuc ceyyūrāṉa jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻanallūrp puṟṟiṭaṅkoṇṭaruḷina mahādevar tiruppa
ḷḷiyaṟainācciyāṟku Ivvūr Ūrom strīdhanamākak kuṭutta nilamāvatu . Ivvūr Erietirvāykku meṟku maturāntakat
tellaikkuk kuḻikkut teṟkuc ceyyūrāṉa virarājentranallūrkku vaṭavellaikku vaṭakku maturāntakattellaikkut teṟku Iraṇ
ṭām tarattu nila muṭpaṭa nirnilamum puṉceyyun tāṅkalum Uṭppaṭṭa nilam pattu velipuvuyum Ippaḷḷiyaṟainācciyāṟku
c cantirātittavarai cellakkaṭavatākavum . Iṉnilattāl vanta Iṟaiyum Āḷum Amañciyum Epperpaṭṭa cilvariyum
Ūrile Eṟṟi nāṅkaḷe Iṟuttuk kuṭukkakkaṭavomākavum . Ippaṭi sammatittu Iṟai Iḻitti Iṉnilattā luḷḷatu
Innācciyāṟku Amutupaṭi cellakkaṭavatāka Ippaṭi lakṣaṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttu lakṣaṇappaṭi kalveṭṭuvittom ceyyūrāṉa jayaṅ
koṇṭacoḻanallūr Ūrom . Ivarkaḷ veṇṭa Eḻutiṉeṉ śrīmaturān=ta kaccaturvvetimaṅkalattu brāhmaṇaṉ pāmputiṇṭi ya
jñamūrttibhaṭṭaneṉ . Ippaṭikku Ivai cempiyaṉ vaḷavataraiya ṉeḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai rājanārāyaṇavaḷavataraiya ṉe
ḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai rājādhirāja vaḷavataraiya ṉeḻuttu . Ippaṭikku Ivai vikkiramacoḻa vaḷavataraiya ṉeḻuttu . Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 8.30 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
